item.title: thesamurai
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: Wizardry 8 Class: the Samurai Best Race: Hobbit: best bonus points; good DEX & SEN Felpurr: Best SPE, fairly good DEX & SEN Mook: High SEN, DEX. & can wield Gaints Sword; KO 30%!!! (2handled) But Very low SPE. Dracon: Very good DEX, STR, and Ok SPE. Bonus VIT. Warning: very low SEN! Controlling attriubutes: Strength (best attrib for adding Attack Rating & to Hit points.
